update settle_channel_manager set channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost_settle_cyc = #{costSettleCyc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effect_flg = #{effectFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_flg = #{checkFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_cyc = #{settleCyc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remote_adress = #{remoteAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remote_user_name = #{remoteUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remote_password = #{remotePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_file_path = #{localFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_author = #{createAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_author = #{updateAuthor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settle_way = #{settleWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_type = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where channel_manange_id = #{channelManangeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from settle_channel_manager where channel_code=#{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_type=#{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and effect_flg=#{effectFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and settle_way = #{settleWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rule_type = #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT DISTINCT channel_code,channel_type,channel_name FROM settle_channel_manager where effect_flg = #{effectFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT DISTINCT channel_code,channel_type,channel_name FROM settle_channel_manager WHERE (channel_code, channel_type) NOT IN
(SELECT channel_code, channel_type FROM settle_channel_log t WHERE DATE_FORMAT(t.oper_begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{operBeginTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and effect_flg = #{effectFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

FROM settle_channel_manager where check_flg =#{checkFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and effect_flg = #{effectFlg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and remote_adress = #{remoteAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
